attributes.action:
Stop the schools mixed gender toilet scheme
across the UK!!!
attributes.additional_details:
High school has become a huge concern to the
Parents and Guardians as school grades have
dropped dramatically due to teachers not
providing the attention…students needs, the
safeguarding has gone down over the years as
there has been many complaints of SA being
brushed under the carpet and instead focused on LGBT, shaming the students who have cried for
help and they have done nothing about it. This
behaviour is unacceptable as i am scared for the
future generation who attend these schools.
attributes.background:
Due to high demand from all students and parents
at various high schools, we are hoping that you
have the ability to resolve our problem for the
safety and Well Being of students who attend
these High Schools, and make females feel comfortable being able to use bathrooms for their
lady needs.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action:

Require schools to have separate toilets for boys and girls: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/614296
